00036 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE> class array
00037 {
00038 protected:
00039     TYPE cont[SIZE];
00040     typedef TYPE *iterator;
00041     typedef const TYPE *const_iterator;
00042     iterator begin() {return cont;}
00043     const_iterator begin()const {return cont;}
00044     iterator end() {return cont + SIZE;}
00045     const_iterator end()const {return cont + SIZE;}
00046 };
00047 }

00049 template < typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER = _internal::array<TYPE, SIZE> >
00050 class FixedVector: protected CONTAINER
00051 {
00052 public:
00053     typedef typename CONTAINER::iterator iterator;
00054     typedef typename CONTAINER::const_iterator const_iterator;
00055     typedef FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER> this_class;
00056 public:
00058     template<typename OP> this_class binary_op( const this_class &src )const {
00059         this_class ret;
00060         std::transform( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), src.begin(), ret.begin(), OP() );
00061         return ret;
00062     }
00063     template<typename OP> this_class binary_op( const TYPE &src )const {
00064         this_class ret;
00065         iterator dst = ret.begin();
00066         const OP op = OP();
00067 
00068         for ( const_iterator i = CONTAINER::begin(); i != CONTAINER::end(); i++, dst++ )
00069             *dst = op( *i, src );
00070 
00071         return ret;
00072     }
00073     template<typename OP> this_class unary_op()const {
00074         this_class ret;
00075         std::transform( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), ret.begin(), OP() );
00076         return ret;
00077     }
00078 
00080     // Contructor stuff
00082 
00086     FixedVector() {fill( TYPE() ); }
00087 
00091     FixedVector( const TYPE src[SIZE] ) {
00092         std::copy( src, src + SIZE, CONTAINER::begin() );
00093     }
00094 
00096     void fill( const TYPE &val ) {
00097         std::fill( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), val );
00098     }
00099 
00101     // Accessors
00103     const TYPE &operator []( size_t idx )const {
00104         LOG_IF( idx >= SIZE, Debug, error ) << "Index " << idx << " exceeds the size of the vector (" << SIZE << ")";
00105         return CONTAINER::begin()[idx];
00106     }
00107     TYPE &operator []( size_t idx ) {
00108         LOG_IF( idx >= SIZE, Debug, error ) << "Index " << idx << " exceeds the size of the vector (" << SIZE << ")";
00109         return CONTAINER::begin()[idx];
00110     }
00111 
00113     // Comparison
00116     bool lexical_less( const this_class &src )const {
00117         const_iterator they = src.begin();
00118         const_iterator me = CONTAINER::begin();
00119 
00120         while ( me != CONTAINER::end() ) {
00121             if ( *they < *me ) return false;
00122             else if ( *me < *they ) return true;
00123 
00124             me++;
00125             they++;
00126         }
00127 
00128         return false;
00129     }
00131     bool lexical_less_reverse( const this_class &src )const {
00132         const_iterator they = src.end();
00133         const_iterator me = CONTAINER::end();
00134 
00135         while ( me != CONTAINER::begin() ) {
00136             me--;
00137             they--;
00138 
00139             if ( *they < *me ) return false;
00140             else if ( *me < *they ) return true;
00141         }
00142 
00143         return false;
00144     }
00146     bool operator==( const this_class &src )const {return std::equal( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), src.begin() );}
00148     bool operator!=( const this_class &src )const {
00149         return !operator==( src );
00150     }
00159     bool fuzzyEqual( const this_class &other, unsigned short boost = 1 )const {
00160         const_iterator b = other.begin();
00161 
00162         for ( const_iterator a = CONTAINER::begin(); a != CONTAINER::end(); ++a, ++b ) {
00163             if ( ! util::fuzzyEqual( *a, *b, boost ) )
00164                 return false;
00165         }
00166 
00167         return true;
00168     }

00173     // Arithmetic operations
00175     this_class operator-( const this_class &src )const {return binary_op<std::minus<TYPE>      >( src );}
00176     this_class operator+( const this_class &src )const {return binary_op<std::plus<TYPE>       >( src );}
00177     this_class operator*( const this_class &src )const {return binary_op<std::multiplies<TYPE> >( src );}
00178     this_class operator/( const this_class &src )const {return binary_op<std::divides<TYPE>    >( src );}
00179 
00180     this_class operator-( const TYPE &src )const {return binary_op<std::minus<TYPE>      >( src );}
00181     this_class operator+( const TYPE &src )const {return binary_op<std::plus<TYPE>       >( src );}
00182     this_class operator*( const TYPE &src )const {return binary_op<std::multiplies<TYPE> >( src );}
00183     this_class operator/( const TYPE &src )const {return binary_op<std::divides<TYPE>    >( src );}
00184 
00189     TYPE dot( const this_class &vect )const {return std::inner_product( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), vect.begin(), TYPE() );}
00194     TYPE sqlen()const {return dot( *this );}
00199     TYPE len()const {return std::sqrt( sqlen() );}
00200 
00211     const this_class &norm()throw( std::invalid_argument ) {
00212         const TYPE d = len();
00213 
00214         if ( d == 0 )throw( std::invalid_argument( "Trying to normalize a vector of length 0" ) );
00215         else *this = *this / d;
00216 
00217         return *this;
00218     }
00219 
00224     TYPE product()const {
00225         TYPE ret = 1;
00226 
00227         for ( const_iterator i = CONTAINER::begin(); i != CONTAINER::end(); i++ )
00228             ret *= *i;
00229 
00230         return ret;
00231     }
00232 
00237     TYPE sum() {
00238         TYPE ret = 0;
00239 
00240         for ( iterator i = CONTAINER::begin(); i != CONTAINER::end(); i++ )
00241             ret += *i;
00242 
00243         return ret;
00244     }

00247     // copy stuff
00250     template<class OutputIterator> void copyTo( OutputIterator out )const {
00251         std::copy( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), out );
00252     }
00253 
00255     template<class InputIterator> void copyFrom( InputIterator start, InputIterator end ) {
00256         LOG_IF( size_t( std::distance( start, end ) ) > SIZE, Runtime, error )
00257                 << "Copying " << std::distance( start, end ) << " Elements into a vector of the size " << SIZE;
00258         std::copy( start, end, CONTAINER::begin() );
00259     }
00260     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2> FixedVector( const FixedVector<TYPE2, SIZE, CONTAINER2> &src ) {
00261         src.copyTo( CONTAINER::begin() );
00262     }
00263 
00265     template<typename charT, typename traits> void writeTo( std::basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out )const {
00266         util::write_list( CONTAINER::begin(), CONTAINER::end(), out, "|", "<", ">" );
00267     }

00271 template<typename TYPE>
00272 class vector4 : public FixedVector<TYPE, 4>
00273 {
00274 public:
00275     vector4() {}
00276     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2> vector4( const FixedVector<TYPE2, 4, CONTAINER2> &src ) : FixedVector< TYPE, 4> ( src ) {}
00277     vector4( TYPE first, TYPE second, TYPE third = 0, TYPE fourth = 0 ) {
00278         this->operator[]( 3 ) = fourth;
00279         this->operator[]( 2 ) = third;
00280         this->operator[]( 1 ) = second;
00281         this->operator[]( 0 ) = first;
00282     }
00283 };

00285 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER1, typename CONTAINER2>
00286 FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> maxVector( const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER1> &first, const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER2> &second )
00287 {
00288     FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> ret( first );
00289 
00290     for ( size_t i = 0; i < SIZE; i++ )
00291         if ( ret[i] < second[i] )ret[i] = second[i];
00292 
00293     return ret;
00294 }
00295 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER1, typename CONTAINER2>
00296 FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> minVector( const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER1> &first, const FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER2> &second )
00297 {
00298     FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> ret( first );
00299 
00300     for ( size_t i = 0; i < SIZE; i++ )
00301         if ( ret[i] > second[i] )ret[i] = second[i];
00302 
00303     return ret;
00304 }

00313 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE, typename CONTAINER >
00314 ::isis::util::FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER> operator-( const ::isis::util::FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER>& s )
00315 {
00316     return s.isis::util::FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE, CONTAINER>::template unary_op<std::negate<float> >();
00317 }
